user.title: UK Train Departures
user.description: Enter your National Rail Darwin API token and station details. Get your API token from the [National Rail Data Portal](https://opendata.nationalrail.co.uk/).

data.station_crs: Station CRS Code (e.g., PAD for Paddington)

data_description.api_token: Your Darwin API token from the National Rail Data Portal
data_description.station_crs: The 3-letter CRS code for your station
data_description.destination_crs: Only show trains going to this destination (optional)
data_description.num_departures: How many departure slots to create (1-10)

watched_trains.title: Watched Trains
watched_trains.description: Configure up to 3 specific trains to track for automations. Enter the scheduled departure time (HH:MM) and optionally filter by destination.

data_description.watched_train_1_time: The scheduled departure time of your train
data_description.watched_train_1_destination: Filter by destination name or CRS code
data_description.watched_train_2_time: The scheduled departure time of your train
data_description.watched_train_2_destination: Filter by destination name or CRS code
data_description.watched_train_3_time: The scheduled departure time of your train
data_description.watched_train_3_destination: Filter by destination name or CRS code

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the National Rail API
